bilingual.source: Arrange the written content and pictures together.
bilingual.target: 将书面内容和图片整理在一起。
这本书有着丰富的内容。
他的博客内容非常有趣。

bilingual.source: The content of this book is very rich.
bilingual.target: 这本书的内容非常丰富。

bilingual.source: The content of this book is excellent.
bilingual.target: 这本书的内容非常优秀。
她的工作内容每天都在变化。

bilingual.source: Movies are graded based on their content.
Developers often rely on tika for content analysis.
bilingual.target: 开发人员经常依赖Tika（一种内容分析工具进行内容分析。

bilingual.source: The content of this mooc is very rich.
bilingual.target: 这门慕课的内容非常丰富。

bilingual.source: The content of these two books is the same.

list.abstract: content，英文单词，有满足的、使满足、目录等含义。同时也是计算机语言的一种方法。

yingyinNormal.en: The other gentleman said that changing the tune was a transformation of actual content.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那位先生说，改变旋律就是改变了原曲的实际内容。

yingyinNormal.en: Or, depending on the content, he sometimes builds an idea incrementally so it's easy to follow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也会是内容情况而定有时候他会逐步地建构一个想法，所以要理解是件很容易的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: But actually there's truth in that. And the argument being that the content we've created just isn't as internationally competitive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是还有一个事实，有人说我们创作的内容并没有要去竞争的意图。

yingyinNormal.en: Prepare extensively for your speech. Know your content backwards and forwards and figure out the absolute best way to present it and do it right over your audience.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做好万全准备！彻底了解你演讲的内容，想出最好的表达方式并呈现给观众。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Whoa, you opened this? Well, I had to find out if it was personal correspondence or memorabilia. Now, as I was saying,based on the content...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还打开看啦？得读过才知道这是私人信件，还是纪念性的信件，我刚说到根据内容呢...

yingyinNormal.en: Just a couple more items. Howard, I found this letter from your dad in a box. Now, based on the content, it could either be filed...
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有几样东西，霍华德，我在盒子里找到这封你爸写的信，根据里面的内容呢，可以被分类去...

yingyinNormal.en: Well, yes. I'm quite content. 'Cause I don't wanna get off this island.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我满意极了，因为我一点也不想离开这个岛。

yingyinNormal.en: And what did you conclude? Objection. He's fishing for content for his lawsuit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的结论是什么？反对，他是在为自己的案件打探线索。

yingyinNormal.en: You see, Barney here was content to work for the small-end money, as an employee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴尼为了一丁点儿小钱，就愿意给人家打工卖命。

yingyinNormal.en: I was like the Tin Man, perfectly content until that evil Wizard gave him a heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当时的我就像铁皮人，对现状非常满足直到邪恶的巫师给了他一颗心。

yingyinNormal.en: So your mirth is merely a discharge of nervous energy with no semantic content at all? My mirth. Classic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说你刚才的欢笑声只是为了释放你的紧张情绪，没有任何实际意义咯？我的欢笑声，还真是谢尔顿的经典语录啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, they don't. Hard as it may be for you to believe, most people don't sort their breakfast cereal numerically by fiber content.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不是那样的，你可能不太相信大多数人不会把早餐麦片按纤维含量的顺序排列。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm telling you, these are those people who never get cancer. They're happy with what they have, they are basically content, like cows.
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉你，这种人不会得癌症，他们对拥有的一切都很开心，就像奶牛一样。

yingyinNormal.en: So are we gonna talk about it or not? Talk about what? About what. This morning. Or are you content to stand in silent judgment with that face?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要不要谈谈。谈什么？谈什么。谈今天早上的事，还是你就想臭着张脸却什么也不说。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, which superpower physics lesson will you explore next? Shifting body size and content, super speed, flight, super strength, immortality, and invisibility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，你打算接着选择哪门超能力物理课去研究？是改变人体大小和成分,超级快的速度，飞行，神力，长生不老，还是隐身。

yingyinNormal.en: We're going to show you a segment of the three-minute video now, but please be warned, the following contains graphic descriptions and disturbing content. Viewer discretion is advised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们会向你们展示三分钟视频里的一段，要提醒各位的是，接下来的视频包含着露骨的叙述以及可能令人不安的部分。请观众酌情观看。

yingyinNormal.en: Humans fancy that there's something special about the way we perceive the world, and yet we live in loops as tight and as closed as the hosts do, seldom questioning our choices, content, for the most part, to be told what to do next.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人类总幻想我们有着一种独特感知世界的方式，然而我们几乎和接待员一模一样，是生活在循环之中，极少质疑我们的选择和满足，在很多时候都是照着别人的意愿行事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We see students achieve more success because they master the <highlight>content</highlight> that allows them to graduate on time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们看到学生取得了更多的成功，因为他们掌握了对顺利毕业至关重要的内容。

examination_example.sentence: Nearly a quarter of web <highlight>content</highlight> shared by Twitter users in the politically critical state of Michigan was fake news.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在政治关键的密歇根州，推特用户分享的近四分之一的网络内容是假新闻。

examination_example.sentence: For several decades America's colleges and universities have produced graduates who don't know the <highlight>content</highlight> and character of liberal education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几十年来，美国的学院和大学培养出的毕业生不知道自由教育的内容和特点。

sense_info_list.en: the state of being satisfied with your situation in life

examination_example.sentence: While their parents were <highlight>content</highlight> to work long hours, young people value flexibility.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他们的父母满足于长时间工作，但年轻人更看重弹性。

examination_example.sentence: A new job, bigger house or better car will be the magic silver bullet that will allow us to finally be <highlight>content</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一份新的工作，更大的房子或更好的汽车将是让我们最终得以满足的灵丹妙药。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of a particular constituent occurring in a substance

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 不满足；不满意；不满的人

word_family.mean: adj. 平静而幸福的；愉快的；满足的；满意的；安于现状的

sense_info_list.en: the substance or material dealt with, as distinct from its form or style
sense_info_list.zh: 内容; 主题; 要旨

examination_example.sentence: The quantity of time spent together is less important than the <highlight>content</highlight> of that time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花在一起的时间的数量不如时间的内容重要。

examination_example.sentence: I see a lot of actors who have the desire to take advantage of this technology: to stored for future <highlight>content</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看到很多演员都有利用这项技术的愿望：以备未来的内容。

examination_example.sentence: I think we're a long way away from having virtual beings that have the ability to pre-sell <highlight>content</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，我们距离拥有能够预售内容的虚拟实体还有很长的路要走。

sense_info_list.en: the state of being satisfied with your situation in life

examination_example.sentence: It's quite possible they're <highlight>content</highlight> with how the individuals they promoted are now performing, merrily ignorant of the damage they're actually causing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很有可能他们满足于他们提拔的人现在的表现，愉快地忽略了他们实际造成的损害。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 平静而幸福的；愉快的；满足的；满意的；安于现状的

sense_info_list.en: the amount of a particular constituent occurring in a substance

examination_example.sentence: Brands which contain higher nicotine <highlight>content</highlight> were found to be much more popular.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尼古丁含量较高的品牌更受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: The biggest increase in nicotine <highlight>content</highlight> tended to be in brands young smokers like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尼古丁含量增加最多的往往是年轻吸烟者喜欢的品牌。

examination_example.sentence: They promised to reduce the nicotine <highlight>content</highlight> in cigarettes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们承诺降低香烟中的尼古丁含量。

sense_info_list.en: information made available by a website or other electronic medium
the things that are held or included in something

examination_example.sentence: Fortunately, all the blueprints for both the building and its <highlight>contents</highlight> have been preserved, so we've been able to replace badly damaged furniture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸运的是，所有建筑和里面物品的设计图都被保存了下来，所以我们能够更换严重损坏的家具。

examination_example.sentence: A recent investigation into the sugar <highlight>content</highlight> of' adult' breakfast cereals found that some cereals contain more than three-quarters of the recommended daily amount of free sugars in each portion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一项对成人早餐麦片含糖量的调查发现，一些早餐谷物片中，每份所含游离糖达到每日推荐摄入量的四分之三。

examination_example.sentence: There have been concerns around the sugar <highlight>content</highlight> of cereal and the food industry's involvement in pro-breakfast research — and even one claim from an academic that breakfast is "dangerous".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们也一直担心谷物中的糖分含量，以及食品行业参与的支持早餐的研究，甚至有学者声称，早餐是“危险的”。

sense_info_list.en: the substance or material dealt with; as distinct from its form or style
sense_info_list.zh: 内容; 主题; 要旨

examination_example.sentence: Extending what is learned at school is positively related to academic achievement, so the <highlight>content</highlight> of homework becomes more important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 延伸到学校学到的东西和学习成绩是正相关的，所以作业的内容变得更加重要。

examination_example.sentence: Such an arrangement is to check not only the <highlight>content</highlight>, pronunciation, eloquence, but also the response capacity of the contestants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的安排不仅要检查参赛者的内容、发音、口才，还要检查参赛者的反应能力。

sense_info_list.en: the state of being satisfied with your situation in life

examination_example.sentence: If you ever get the impression that your dog can "tell" whether you look <highlight>content</highlight> or annoyed, you may be onto something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你有过这样的印象，你的狗能“分辨”出你是满意还是恼怒，那么你可能发现了什么。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the substance or material dealt with, as distinct from its form or style
sense_info_list.zh: 内容; 主题; 要旨

examination_example.sentence: In addition, our site's unique (独特的) features for members include profile pages, discussion forums (论坛), and other <highlight>contents</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，我们网站为会员提供的独有功能包括个人资料页面、论坛和其他内容。

examination_example.sentence: They start learning by touching the <highlight>contents</highlight> in the books with the pen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通过用笔触摸书中的内容开始学习。

examination_example.sentence: Revise the draft to improve its <highlight>content</highlight>, organization, and style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对草案进行修改，改进内容、结构和风格。

examination_example.sentence: In this passage, "she was <highlight>content</highlight> with her life there" means she was happy with her life there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这篇文章中，“她对那里的生活很满意”的意思是她对那里的生活很满意。
